item.title: How to prepare for an interview?
item.author: 880831ian@gmail.com (PinYi)
item.description:
Self-introduction first, can help the interviewer find the topic to continue the subsequent interview

Need to know about the company that recruits talents, and know the content of the vacancies in the interview

Don’t just care about what you can get, but say how much value you can give to the job

item.title: What is the best way to write a resume?
item.author: 880831ian@gmail.com (PinYi)
item.description:
Before writing your resume, let’s imagine who you are going to show your resume to? For example, HR, headhunting company, colleagues in the same department across departments?

So the presentation of the resume and whether it can be read by him is very important. You have to think of yourself as an interviewer, and think from the interviewer’s point of view. What content do you want to see?
